name: Wattpad Corp.
address:
Our Toronto office
Located downtown Toronto, the heart of Canada’s startup capital
Brick & beam office space boasts glorious natural sunlight, loft-style exposed brick, and a sunny rooftop patio
We’re located close to St. Lawrence Market, with lots of tasty food options and shopping
Our leadership selected our office location for its proximity to transit options. We’re just a 5-minute walk from Union Station with easy access to TTC, GO Trains, Pearson Express (UP), and VIA Rail
toronto2.png
Our Halifax office
Our Halifax office is located in Volta, Canada’s East Coast innovation hub
We’re downtown Halifax—just steps from the beautiful waterfront district
We’re located close to the Halifax Seaport Farmer’s Market and many of the city’s best restaurants and cafés
We’re steps from a Line 7 bus stop and just two blocks away from the Halifax VIA Rail station
